casebody.data:
Case No. 3,470. The CUMBERLAND. District Court, D. Massachusetts. 1815. Salvage — Owner of Rescuing Vessel — Compensation.

[Cited in The Henry Ewbank, Case No. 6,-370, and in a note to The Waterloo, Id. 17,-257. to the point that, in cases of extraordinary merit or extraordinary peril to the rescuing ship, the owner of the latter should be allowed a moiety of the salvage.]
